text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump #NoMoreMrNiceGuy @realDonaldTrump @w_terrence It’s time to push this forward and get to the bottom of #ObamaGate Our great president can multi-task in such a great way that he can choke the COVID-19 with one hand while b-slapping #ObamaAdmin with the other!
